item.title: APEC-SMETC has sold out all 1,200 booths
item.description:
The APEC Small & Medium Enterprises Technology Conference and Fair (APEC-SMETC) will take place in Yiwu, China, a global hub for consumer goods, from June 19th to 22nd. This event aims to provide a platform for APEC members to display new technologies and products, encourage technological exchange, and foster economic cooperation among SMEs in the Asia-Pacific region, ultimately boosting their international success. The 8th APEC-SMETC, themed “technology promotes the economy, cooperation creates the future”, will showcase innovative products and technologies from SMEs across the region...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/apec-smetc-has-sold-out-all-1-200-booths/

item.title: Toyo Koda will enhance the menus at Le Passage Mohkan Shan
item.description:
Source: Le Passage Mohkan Shan website. Le Passage Mohkan Shan, a French-style hotel and restaurant nestled in its own private tea plantation at the base of Moganshan* mountain in China, has appointed Toyo Koda as its new head chef. This strategic hire emphasizes the hotel’s aim to become a premier culinary destination in Asia. Chef Toyo, previously recognized as one of Asia’s top chefs by the San Pellegrino Restaurant Awards in 2013 for his role at Shanghai’s French restaurant Franck, is poised to transform the hotel’s culinary offerings...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/toyo-koda-will-enhance-the-menus-at-le-passage-mohkan-shan/
